name: Grip-Rite Prolok Rebar and Mesh Chairs - Set of 40
description: Grip-Rite PROLOK, a new line of rebar and mesh chairs - the only products with patented locking heads. Holds and elevates rebar and wire mesh off the ground. Eliminate the use of tie wire and bar ties, due to the patented locking heads securely holding the rebar or mesh in place.Fits #3 - #4 rebar and all mesh sizesIncrease your productivity and decrease your material costsReduce installer fatigueStrong, durable and lightweightSold by the bucket at 40 per bucket
